issue.title: [CF 1024] Diminishing Returns for Knockbacks
issue.body:
Hello, I would like to request that you add a new DR Category for Knockback effects that blizzard added to the game.

Death Knight - Gorefiend's Grasp
Druid -Typhoon, Ursol's Vortex
Hunter - Explosive Trap
Shaman - Thunderstorm
Warlock - Fellash (Shivarra), Whiplash (Succubus)

It would help a lot of people out. Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Shroomblaze | Imported from CurseForge issue #1024 | Raw

comments.body:
It might not be possible since there is no way to actually check when a knockback actually knocks back someone (versus hitting them but not knocking back).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

This is not possible. There is no way to determine when someone gets knocked back by looking at the combat log.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
